feature1: Different from traditional investment platforms, Lend A Hand is focused on members. We do not hold any member investments. Instead, our community shares and exchange our assets freely. By aggregating reinvestment and making decisions democratic, we can create a positive change in our community.
feature2: At Lend A Hand, we use blockchain technology to ensure transparent, secure and efficient transactions. This allows our members to invest with confidence, knowing that their money is used for good. Our platform also protects members' privacy while ensuring transparency and accountability.
feature3: Community Share InvestmentAt Lend A Hand, we believe that community investing will make a significant social impact.Our platform allows members to support the LAH community while build our wealth. By investing directly in LAH members, we can make a difference in people's lives and build a secure future.
Đầu tư vào Tương lai của bạn cùng với Le: Invest in Your Future with Lend A Hand

termTitle: Lend A Hand Program - Terms and Conditions
term11: The Lend A Hand Program is a community-based initiative that aims to help members achieve financial freedom by providing voluntary assistance to one another.
term12: Participants in the Program are individuals who voluntarily offer their assistance to other Lend A Hand members.
term21: Participants must meet the following criteria to be eligible for the Program :
term21a: Participants must be 16 years old or above.
term21b: Participants are required to contribute a certain amount of money to other Lend A Hand members, based on the specific tier requirements. New members must commit to referring a minimum of 3 members within the first 3 weeks of becoming a Lend A Hand member and maintaining 3 direct referrals to retain membership.
term21c: Participants must provide a valid government-issued ID, driver's license, or passport.
term21d: Members are responsible for refunding any mistaken transfers made to their accounts.
term22: Participants must complete the registration process, providing accurate and up-to-date information.
term31a: Provide their assistance voluntarily and without any expectation of compensation.
term31b: Abide by all applicable laws, rules, and regulations while participating in the Lend A Hand Program.
term31c: Treat the recipients of their assistance with respect and dignity.
term31d: Maintain the confidentiality of any personal or sensitive information obtained during the Program.
term32: Participants must obtain proper consent, where applicable, from the recipients of their assistance to collect and use any personal or sensitive information.
term41: WeUnity and its affiliates shall not be liable for any loss, damage, or injury arising out of or in connection with the Program, including acts or omissions of Participants.
term51: WeUnity reserves the right to suspend or terminate a Participant's involvement in the Program at any time if they fail to comply with these terms and conditions or if their conduct is deemed detrimental to the Program or its recipients.
term61: WeUnity may modify these terms and conditions at any time, and such modifications shall be effective upon posting on www.lah12.com.
term71: These terms and conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the terms and conditions of WeUnity.
Chào mừng bạn đến với Lend a Hand, Hệ th: Welcome to Lend A Hand, A revolutionary system for accumulating wealth through mutual support.
Với Lend a Hand, bạn có thể tham gia vào: With Lend a Hand, you can join a community of like-minded individuals who are committed to helping each other grow financially. As an active member of our platform, you can participate in a network of generous people who support each other in times of need.
Cho dù bạn đang đối mặt với một khoản ch: Whether you're facing an unexpected expense, looking to invest in a new business venture, or simply want to save for the future, Lend a Hand can help. Our members pool their resources together and provide financial assistance to one another, creating a cycle of wealth accumulation.
